actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 8191 of title 5, United States Code, to extend benefits thereunder to officially recognized or designated members of a legally organized volunteer fire department, ambulance team, or rescue squad not employed by the United States who are killed or totally disabled in the line of duty.

summary.text: Extends Federal death and total disability benefits, currently provided to law enforcement officers, to members of a legally organized volunteer fire department who are killed or totally disabled in the line of duty. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8191)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 8191 of title 5, United States Code, to extend benefits thereunder to officially recognized or designated members of a legally organized volunteer fire department, ambulance team, or rescue squad not employed by the United States who are killed or totally disabled in the line of duty.
